# NHS-R Community Ways of working {.unnumbered}

## Committee
We are steered by our [committee](#committee), itself made of volunteers.

## Code of Conduct
All who intend to interact in any way with our community are required to uphold our [Code of Conduct](#code-of-conduct).

## Accessibility
We aim to make all our resources as [accessible](#accessibility) as possible, and would [welcome your help](#get-involved) in improving how we can do this!

## Style
We would like all our products, and thus also your contributions, to follow our [style guide](#style_guides).
